summary:
Identifying the core challenges faced by Tier 2 & Tier 3 college students is crucial. These students often lack access to structured learning resources, professional mentorship, and AI-driven career guidance. The absence of tailored learning tools and real-world interview preparation creates a gap in employability. Eklavya AI aims to bridge this gap by offering curated learning resources, AI-powered assessments, and interactive mentorship
Introducing Eklavya AI, an AI-driven career guidance and interview preparation platform tailored for Tier 2 & Tier 3 college students. Our solution integrates:
✅ AI-powered interview simulations for real-world readiness ✅ Personalized learning paths based on industry trends ✅ Mentorship from industry experts for career guidance ✅ Automated resume analysis with AI-driven improvements ✅ Gamified learning & ranking system to encourage engagement
Empowering students with practical skills, real interview exposure, and expert mentorship, Eklavya AI ensures better job opportunities and career success. this we are making in hacathon
